attributes.action: NO further referendums regarding the EU. The decision was made to leave.
attributes.additional_details: Watch and read all the campaigns prior to the vote taking place. The political establishment and other parties seem to have forgotten their words.
attributes.background: In 2016 the British people had the choice to vote on leaving or remaining within the EU. The government and all parties involved agreed. What ever the choice was made. They would adhere to and act upon the decision. Now, they are back tracking because it wasn't what they wanted.
